title: Expose Finance Guides at /finance-guides and add to main navigation

requirements.summary: Create/confirm a publicly reachable Finance Guides page at /finance-guides registered in the TanStack Router tree and rendered within the existing Layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /finance-guides in the browser renders the Finance Guides page content and does not show the NotFoundPage.
The Finance Guides page renders inside the existing Layout component (same header/footer and container styling).
No existing tool routes/components are modified.

file_operations.description: Create a new Finance Guides React page component with static content consistent with existing non-tool pages (e.g., About/Contact). Use existing shadcn/ui Card components for layout consistency (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Register a new /finance-guides route in the TanStack Router route tree that renders the FinanceGuidesPage within the existing root Layout (header/footer/main container unchanged). Ensure this route does not collide with or alter any existing tool routes/components.

requirements.summary: Add a ROUTES constant for /finance-guides and use it consistently for router registration and navigation linking.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/routes.ts exports a new ROUTES entry for the Finance Guides path.
The router registration and navigation link for Finance Guides reference the ROUTES constant (no duplicated hard-coded path strings for this page).

file_operations.description: Add ROUTES.FINANCE_GUIDES mapped to /finance-guides and export it alongside existing route constants.
Update Finance Guides route registration and the navigation link to reference ROUTES.FINANCE_GUIDES (no hard-coded /finance-guides strings for this page).

requirements.summary: Append a “Finance Guides” item to the existing main navigation navItems list for both desktop and mobile menus without reordering/restyling existing items.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header navigation shows a new link labeled “Finance Guides”.
Mobile navigation shows the same “Finance Guides” link.
The new link points to /finance-guides via the ROUTES constant.
Existing navigation items remain in the same order and appearance; the Finance Guides item is appended.

file_operations.description: Append a new navItems entry { label: 'Finance Guides', path: ROUTES.FINANCE_GUIDES } at the end of the existing navItems array so it appears in both desktop and mobile navigation, without changing existing items' order or styling.

requirements.summary: Ensure /finance-guides is publicly accessible (no authentication required and no conditional hiding) and loads for anonymous users.
acceptanceCriteria: When not logged in (anonymous), /finance-guides loads successfully and shows the Finance Guides page content.
No login prompt or auth-gated logic blocks access to /finance-guides.

file_operations.description: Ensure the Finance Guides route is registered as a normal public route under the root Layout and is not wrapped in any auth-guard or conditional rendering logic; keep behavior consistent with other public static pages (About/Contact).

Implement the Finance Guides page as static, anonymous-friendly content with no authentication-dependent hooks or conditional access logic (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing if using shadcn/ui building blocks).

requirements.summary: Apply default non-homepage, non-tool SEO behavior for /finance-guides consistent with existing static pages, without altering homepage SEO or tool SEO.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /finance-guides applies the default (non-home) SEO behavior used by existing static pages (e.g., About/Contact) without altering the Home page SEO.
No changes are made to existing tool SEO entries unless strictly required for Finance Guides.

file_operations.description: Add a FinanceGuides route wrapper component that calls restoreDefaultSEO() on mount (mirroring About/Contact) rather than applyToolSEO, and wire that wrapper to the Finance Guides route.

requirements.summary: Update the static sitemap to include /finance-guides while leaving all existing entries unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/sitemap.xml contains a new <url> entry for https://sankalphub-a1l.caffeine.xyz/finance-guides.
All existing <url> entries remain present and unchanged aside from insertion of the new entry.

file_operations.description: Insert a new <url> entry for https://sankalphub-a1l.caffeine.xyz/finance-guides, preserving all existing <url> entries exactly as-is aside from the new insertion.
